page.title: 06Farming
page.content: {Newlands Farm}-is on a flat land with mainly heavy soil.The farm has 500 acres.This years program is:-100 acres potatoes-sent to The Smiths Crisps factory at Paulsgrove.We have recently constructed a reservoir which holds 8 million gallons of water.This is natural water saved from the land,and used to water potatoes. 200 acres oil seed rape-which when harvested will be sent to a crushing mill to extract the oil then used for human consumption. 295 acres of wheat-this is sent to the mills to be processed to animal feed. 5 acres strawberrys-the fruit is grown for a 'pick your own' system. There is a pig unit which houses 4,500 pigs ranging from 25-45 kilos.They are sold and later killed for backon. There is a small farm shop which sells meat and products from the farm.
